camera.primary_camera_features: Panorama, Face Detection, Geo-tagging, Tap to Focus, Auto Focus, iSight Camera

product_basic_info.description: A premium phone that brings out the best of the smartphone world, puts it together in a beautiful package and presents it to you on a fully functional platter, the iPhone 5 is yet another success story of Apple. The Best Your Eye Can See A 4 inch touchscreen that has so many pixels that the human eye cannot distinguish amongst them, the iPhone Retina Display ensures that you fall for the clear, crisp and bright colors like no other smartphone can reproduce, hook, line and sinker. The capacitive touchscreen is just the right size to fit into the palm, making everything seem better with every blink of the eye. Smooth operations Optimized solely for the iPhone and created to look and perform the best, the iOS 6 operating system combines convenience and functionality with great looks without making life any more complicated than it has to be. Picture Perfect A photographer’s delight, the iPhone 5’s iSight 8 megapixel camera that comes with LED flash reproduces life in bright, bold colors. The 1.2 megapixel secondary camera makes Facetime with a loved one easier and with full HD recording and playback, the iPhone surpasses expectations when it comes to capturing and preserving moments as life flits past. The phone also holds on to capture information to let you know which photo was clicked when without you having to rack your brains. Customized Processor With an A6 chip processor that has been custom-created for the iPhone 5, watch the applications you launch on the operating system perform like butter on toast. Better graphics, faster processing of any application and anything more that you can think of, all with the best of power management possible. Beautiful Technology As always, Apple presents a machine that is crafted to appeal to the eye, with a sleek design that will capture hearts - owner’s pride, neighbour’s envy indeed.
product_basic_info.title: Apple iPhone 5 (Black, 16 GB)
